book.title: King Max
book.author: Dick King-Smith
book.summary: A nighttime walk in the park turns into an adventure when Max the hedgehog is caught by two scientists. When Max is set free, his friends think the transmitter the scientists put on his head is a crown.
book.uniquesubtopics: Misc./Other, Manners, Planet Reader

book.title: Max the Mighty Superhero
book.author: Trina Wiebe
book.summary: When Max learns that it is possible to get financial rewards for helping others, he decides to become a superhero and perform rescues, but the only one to need rescuing is a dog whose owner is anything but grateful.

book.uniquesubtopics: Canadian Content (All), Helping Others, Heroes, Canadian Children's Book Centre's Our Choice , Max-a-Million

book.title: Max the Mighty
book.author: Rodman Philbrick

book.uniquesubtopics: Crime, Escape, State Award, Friendship, Secrets

book.title: Max and the Secret Skunk

book.uniquesubtopics: Dogs, Skunks, Funny

book.title: Max the Muddy Puppy

book.title: Doorway to Doom
book.author: Jim Denney
book.summary: Max and several of his middle school friends go through the Doorway of the Ages back to the Middle Ages, where their faith helps them stand up to a cruel king and his evil alchemist.
book.uniquesubtopics: Middle Ages, Friends, Royalty, Christian Life, Time Travel, Timebenders

book.title: Small Gifts in God's Hands
book.author: Max Lucado
book.summary: A young boy named Elijah learns that no gift is too small in God's hands as he watches Jesus feed thousands of hungry people from Elijah's basket of bread and fish.
book.uniquesubtopics: Fish, Grains/Bread, Christian Life, Christianity

book.title: If Only I Had a Green Nose
book.author: Max Lucado
book.summary: Punchinello learns that it can be difficult, foolish, and even dangerous to try to keep up with the latest fads and that Eli, his maker, gave each Wemmick different characteristics on purpose.
book.uniquesubtopics: Cliques/Clubs, Self Acceptance, Wemmicks

book.title: Lost in Cydonia
book.author: Jim Denney
book.summary: Max, Grady, Toby, and Allie and her father unexpectedly head for Mars in an antigravity orange Volkswagen named Timebender, where the Timelings help them learn more about God's will for their lives.
book.uniquesubtopics: Friends, Christian Life, Aliens, Time Travel, Timebenders

book.title: The Outsider
book.author: Melinda Metz
book.summary: Max knows that he can't let Liz get to close or she will discover that he is not like other guys, and the truth could be fatal!
book.uniquesubtopics: School, Friendship, Aliens, Roswell High

book.title: The Boy Next Door
book.author: Meggin Cabot
book.summary: After finding her elderly neighbor in a coma, Melissa Fuller contacts the woman's nephew Max, who despite a reputation as a womanizer turns out to be very lovable. The bond between them is broken when Melissa discovers he is not who he says he is.

subtopics.subtopic: SLJ Adult Book for High School Students
YALSA Quick Picks for Reluctant YA

book.uniquesubtopics: Internet, Neighbors, SLJ Adult Book for High School Students, YALSA Quick Picks for Reluctant YA , Computers, New York, Women's Studies (All)

book.title: La Canción más bonita
book.author: Max Bolliger
book.summary: En sus sueños, el rey tuvo un hermoso sueño, el canto de pájaro más bello del mundo. Desde ese momento, su única preocupación es encontrar al artista. ¿Podrá el rey encontrar al autor de la canción más bonita.
book.uniquesubtopics: Birds, Music, Royalty

book.title: Past Tense
book.author: Ken Roberts
book.summary: Elspeth the clown makes mysterious appearances every Halloween, but now she is here in the summer to cheer a very sick friend. Max is sure this is the wrong thing to do and he finds himself faced with confusing questions about loyalty and compassion.
book.uniquesubtopics: Silver Birch Award/Nominee, Young Reader's Choice Award/Nominee, Canadian Content (All), Uncles, Magic, Clowns

book.title: Frog Is Frog
book.author: Max Velthuijs
book.summary: Poor Frog wants to be like his friends, Pig, Duck, Rat, and Hare, but his attempts to copy them all end in disaster. Eventually, Frog learns that his friends love him for being himself - an ordinary green frog.
book.uniquesubtopics: Envy, Friendship, Self Acceptance, Sapo
